verses.verse: Then Eliashib <S%H475><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> with his brothers <S%H251><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and they built <S%H1129><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>; they sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it <S%H5975><s%>, and set up the doors <S%H1817><s%> of it <S%H4026><s%>; even unto the tower of Meah <S%H3968><s%> they sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it <S%H4026><s%>, unto the tower of Hananeel <S%H2606><s%>.

And next unto him <S%H3027><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>. And next to them built <S%H1129><s%> Zaccur <S%H2139><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imri <S%H566><s%>.

But the fish <S%H1709><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> did the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hassenaah <S%H5570><s%> build <S%H1129><s%>, who also laid the beams <S%H7136><s%> there <S%H5975><s%>, and set up the doors <S%H1817><s%> there <S%H4514><s%>, the locks there <S%H1280><s%>, and the bars there.

And next unto them <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Meremoth <S%H4822><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Urijah <S%H223><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Koz <S%H6976><s%>. And next unto them <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshezabeel <S%H4898><s%>. And next unto them <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baana <S%H1195><s%>.

And next unto them <S%H3027><s%> the Tekoites <S%H8621><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%>; but their nobles <S%H117><s%> put <S%H935><s%> not their necks <S%H6677><s%> to the work <S%H5656><s%> of their Lord <S%H113><s%>.

Moreover the old <S%H3465><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Jehoiada <S%H3111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Paseah <S%H6454><s%>, and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Besodeiah <S%H1152><s%>; they laid the beams <S%H7136><s%> there <S%H5975><s%>, and set up the doors <S%H1817><s%> there <S%H4514><s%>, and the locks there <S%H1280><s%>, and the bars there.

And next unto them <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Melatiah <S%H4424><s%> the Gibeonite <S%H1393><s%>, and Jadon <S%H3036><s%> the Meronothite <S%H4824><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>, and of Mizpah <S%H4709><s%>, unto the throne <S%H3678><s%> of the governor <S%H6346><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%>.

Next unto him <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harhaiah <S%H2736><s%>, of the goldsmiths <S%H6884><s%>. Next unto him <S%H3027><s%> also repaired <S%H2388><s%> Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of one of the apothecaries <S%H7546><s%>, and they fortified <S%H5800><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> unto the broad <S%H7342><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%>.

And next unto them <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur <S%H2354><s%>, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> part <S%H6418><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And next unto them <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Jedaiah <S%H3042><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harumaph <S%H2739><s%>, even over against his house <S%H1004><s%>. And next unto him <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Hattush <S%H2407><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabniah <S%H2813><s%>.

Malchijah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harim <S%H2766><s%>, and Hashub <S%H2815><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pahath <S%H6355><s%>–moab, repaired <S%H2388><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> piece <S%H4060><s%>, and the tower <S%H4026><s%> of the furnaces <S%H8574><s%>.

And next unto him <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Halohesh <S%H3873><s%>, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> part <S%H6418><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, he and his daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

The valley <S%H1516><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Hanun <S%H2586><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Zanoah <S%H2182><s%>; they built <S%H1129><s%> it <S%H5975><s%>, and set up the doors <S%H1817><s%> there <S%H4514><s%>, the locks there <S%H1280><s%>, and the bars there <S%H505><s%>, and a thousand cubits <S%H520><s%> on the wall <S%H2346><s%> unto the dung <S%H830><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>.

But the dung <S%H830><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Malchiah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab <S%H7394><s%>, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of part <S%H6418><s%> of Beth <S%H1021><s%>–haccerem; he built <S%H1129><s%> it <S%H5975><s%>, and set up the doors <S%H1817><s%> there <S%H4514><s%>, the locks there <S%H1280><s%>, and the bars there.

But the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the fountain <S%H5869><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Shallun <S%H7968><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Col <S%H3626><s%>–hozeh, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of part <S%H6418><s%> of Mizpah <S%H4709><s%>; he built <S%H1129><s%> it <S%H2926><s%>, and covered it <S%H5975><s%>, and set up the doors <S%H1817><s%> there <S%H4514><s%>, the locks there <S%H1280><s%>, and the bars there <S%H2346><s%>, and the wall of the pool <S%H1295><s%> of Siloah <S%H7975><s%> by the king <S%H4428><s%>'s garden <S%H1588><s%>, and unto the stairs <S%H4609><s%> that go down <S%H3381><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azbuk <S%H5802><s%>, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> part <S%H6418><s%> of Beth <S%H1049><s%>–zur, unto the place over against the tombs <S%H6913><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and to the pool <S%H1295><s%> that was made <S%H6213><s%>, and unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Rehum <S%H7348><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani <S%H1137><s%>. Next unto him <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> part <S%H6418><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%>, in his part <S%H6418><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> their brothers <S%H251><s%>, Bavai <S%H942><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad <S%H2582><s%>, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> part <S%H6418><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%>.

And next to him <S%H3027><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> Ezer <S%H5829><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, the ruler <S%H8269><s%> of Mizpah <S%H4709><s%>, another <S%H8145><s%> piece <S%H4060><s%> over against the going up <S%H5927><s%> to the armoury <S%H5402><s%> at the turning of the wall <S%H4740><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabbai <S%H2079><s%> earnestly <S%H2734><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> piece <S%H4060><s%>, from the turning <S%H4740><s%> of the wall unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Meremoth <S%H4822><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Urijah <S%H223><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Koz <S%H6976><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> piece <S%H4060><s%>, from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%> even to the end <S%H8503><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%>.
And after <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> of the plain <S%H3603><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> and Hashub <S%H2815><s%> over against their house <S%H1004><s%>. After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ananiah <S%H6055><s%> by <S%H681><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Binnui <S%H1131><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad <S%H2582><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> piece <S%H4060><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Azariah <S%H5838><s%> unto the turning <S%H4740><s%> of the wall <S%H6438><s%>, even unto the corner.

Palal <S%H6420><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzai <S%H186><s%>, over against the turning <S%H4740><s%> of the wall <S%H4026><s%>, and the tower which lies out <S%H3318><s%> from the king <S%H4428><s%>'s high <S%H5945><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, that was by the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%>. After <S%H310><s%> him Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh <S%H6551><s%>.

Moreover the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Ophel <S%H6077><s%>, unto the place over against the water <S%H4325><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> toward the east <S%H4217><s%>, and the tower <S%H4026><s%> that lies out <S%H3318><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> them the Tekoites <S%H8621><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> piece <S%H4060><s%>, over against the great <S%H1419><s%> tower <S%H4026><s%> that lies out <S%H3318><s%>, even unto the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Ophel <S%H6077><s%>.
From above the horse <S%H5483><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> over against <S%H5048><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> them repaired <S%H2388><s%> Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer <S%H564><s%> over against his house <S%H1004><s%>. After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> also Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shechaniah <S%H7935><s%>, the keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the east <S%H4217><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah <S%H8018><s%>, and Hanun <S%H2586><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Zalaph <S%H6764><s%>, another <S%H8145><s%> piece <S%H4060><s%>. After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> over against his chamber <S%H5393><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> him repaired <S%H2388><s%> Malchiah <S%H4441><s%> the goldsmith <S%H6885><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%> unto the place <S%H1004><s%> of the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%>, and of the merchants <S%H7402><s%>, over against the gate <S%H8179><s%> Miphkad <S%H4663><s%>, and to the going up <S%H5944><s%> of the corner <S%H6438><s%>.
And between the going up <S%H5944><s%> of the corner <S%H6438><s%> unto the sheep <S%H6629><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the goldsmiths <S%H6884><s%> and the merchants <S%H7402><s%>.
